text: Anyone know if there's a way to insert a link inside of an Alert being sent using addAlert? I'm guessing it only supports text but before I abandon it completely, figured I'd ask if anyone else knew.

<@U0764EN4XKJ>, I don't know enough about your requirements, but just occurred to me that you could use a modal as a workaround for it.
Open the message in a small modal with a clickable link
